name: Attack of the cubes on the Astral Plane
name_original: Attack of the cubes on the Astral Plane
description:
Wave mode: Grapple and wall run to keep a safe distance while you fight through waves of enemies in a procedurally generated cityscape. The only way to stay safe is to keep off the ground as long as you can! By the way, grenades and shock waves are your best friend!

Survival mode: Avoid and run from invincible enemies for as long as you can!

Play with mouse and keyboard or gamepad.

Make sure to adjust the color scheme and bloom intensity to your liking!
